# This file was generated by gr_modtool, a tool from the GNU Radio framework
# This file is a part of gr-cran

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(
    $ENV{CONDA_PREFIX}/include/gnuradio/zeromq/
)
list(APPEND cran_sources
    rrh_zmq_sink_impl.cc
    worker_zmq_source_impl.cc
    end_node_zmq_sink_impl.cc
    lora_frame_sync_impl.cc
    kiss_fft.c
    uhd_usrp_source_custom_impl.cc
    usrp_block_impl.cc
    rx_combining_impl.cc
    zmq_dealer_sink_impl.cc
    worker_zmq_sink_impl.cc
    lora_frame_detector_single_sf_impl.cc )

set(cran_sources "${cran_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT cran_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT cran_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-cran SHARED ${cran_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-cran gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime fftw3 fftw3f)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-cran
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-cran PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_cran_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-cran PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-cran)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_cran_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-cran)

if(NOT test_cran_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_cran_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_cran_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("cran_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
